title: Stuck on logo and progress bar??
body:
Hey, this started about 2 weeks ago when i tried to update lol with a recent patch. For some reason when i try to run the lol launcher it brings up the logo with a grey progress bar at the bottom, it stays like that for 3-5 minutes then disappears. I have tried it several times  and followed every guide on how to fix similar problems.. e.g. delete files in rads folder, reinstall lol completely, unblock through firewall and run as admin etc... 

This is the log file from the rads kernal...

replies.body:
Please do not put the logs as text in a post. It's bad habit. Instead, attach the logs as an attachment so only the people who want to read them download them.

Now, have you tried **running as admin and waiting at least ten minutes** in combination?

Have you tried literally everything mentioned on [this page](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/202969434-Patching-Issues). Mainly, try running the patcher at a different screen resolution. Also, make sure the compatibility mode is activated in the executable's properties.

If you think it's specifically a connection issue, try [this page](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664).

Best of luck.
